/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of white and beige, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochromatic structures. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
